amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the National Endowment for the Arts by $30 million and transfer those funds to the United States Forest Service to reduce the threat of catastrophic wildfires.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funding of the National Endowment of the Arts by $30 million and to increasefunding for Wildland Fire Management by $28.5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Beauprez amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 112 - 306 (Roll no. 166).
